name: Micro Machines V3
description: Micro Machines V3 is the ultimate competitive challenge which takes any hardcore racing game fan and, quite literally, cuts them down to size! Miniaturized to become the drivers of the famous scale vehicles that are the Micro Machines toys, up to four simultaneous players have the task of beating up to eight other road maniacs on chaotic circuits around a house and garden packed with obstacles and hazards.
